articles.content: For the past couple of days, FIFA's twitter handle has been posting fantasy teams for Sevens Football, a form of the game very popular in the state of Kerala. They picked players like any of us would… [+3417 chars]

articles.title: Indonesia qualify for their first ever ICC World Cup - International Cricket Council

articles.title: Djokovic battles back to beat Sinner, to face Norrie in semi-final - CGTN
